Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.islands

Class IslandChain

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.ModelEventCreator
it.polimi.ingsw.model.islands.IslandChain
All Implemented Interfaces:
Simplifiable, GameEventCreator
public class IslandChain extends ModelEventCreator implements Simplifiable

IslandChain manages the islands and the various teams' towers

its most important methods are:

moveMotherNature

addTempMotherNature

addTokens

changeIslandTokens

mergeIslands

  • Method Details

    • newDefaultIslandChain

      public static IslandChain newDefaultIslandChain(Map<String,List<String>> teams) throws IllegalArgumentException, SameNameException
      creates the default islands chain for playing the game
      Parameters:
      teams - a map {teamName: teamPlayers}
      Returns:
      an IslandChain with the desired teams
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - thrown when there's a different number of players then 2, 3 of 4
      SameNameException - thrown when there are homonym players

    • changeIslandTowers

      protected void changeIslandTowers(int islandIndex, TowerEnum newColour) throws GameShouldBeOverException

      replaces the selected island's tower colour with the desired one.

      it also ensures the previous towers are correctly return to their owner

      while the new towers are taken from the new owner

      Parameters:
      islandIndex - island on which the switch has to be made
      newColour - desired new island's tower colour
      Throws:
      GameShouldBeOverException - thrown when the player's number of tower falls below zero during switch

      Returns:
      optional containing the team, if present

    • mergeIslands

      public void mergeIslands()

      Forces the merging of islands.

      Two islands merge when they are adjacent and have the same tower colour
